title: Hex Tech Repair Tool
body:
I can use hex tech repair tool very well but its my league game that is messed up. Every-time I re-patch uninstall and reinstall only after the re-patch can I play the game. But the moment I close the game when I go to play league it only pulls up the "Launch" screen. I click "Launch" and nothing happens. I have restarted my computer like I said before uninstalled and reinstalled and re-patched but nothing seems to keep the process running smoothly would love some help!

{{champion:412}} {{champion:164}} ~ Dayz

replies.body:
When you used the hextech repair tool, were you previously using the hextech repair tool?  The tool may currently only work with the legacy client, so in this case a [reinstall ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends)may be necessary.  

Also, if your launch button is not working then you could also have a security issue blocking the client from launching.  I suggest using the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide as well just to make sure your settings are allowing access.  I hope that helps!
Actually that did work my fault.. Thank you so much for the help made my day much better :D Back to season 7 ranked matches many thanks ~Chris{{champion:412}}
Okay so I have the new client but now everytime I click it, it will not open. I've tried running as admin, and the selected permission you've suggested but they haven't seemed to work....
